title: ROBOS: GIBBERISH VOCALIZATIONS, P1
description: Robotic and High-Tech Alien Voices Soundpack for Sci-Fi Games
longDescription:
Listen to the watermarked demo of some of the sounds:

CLICK HERE

 

“Created by us using industry-leading sound design techniques, we introduce “ROBOS: GIBBERISH VOCALIZATIONS, P1,” a versatile audio asset pack featuring a collection of unique robotic gibberish vocalizations, perfect for adding character and personality to your game projects. With 10 distinct types of tonalities, each organized into separate folders, this pack offers a wide range of sounds to suit various in-game scenarios.”


Key Features:


  1. 10 Types of Tonalities: Each folder contains a different set of robotic gibberish vocalizations, providing a diverse array of sounds to choose from.
  2. High-Quality Audio: All sound effects are recorded and processed in high quality to ensure clarity and impact.
  3. Versatile Use Cases: Suitable for various game genres, including sci-fi, fantasy, adventure, and more.
technicalDetails:
TOTAL UNIQUE SOUNDS: 680

  1. Robo_Typ01 = 64 Voices
  2. Robo_Typ02 = 66 Voices
  3. Robo_Typ03 = 67 Voices
  4. Robo_Typ04 = 72 Voices
  5. Robo_Typ05 = 68 Voices
  6. Robo_Typ06 = 69 Voices
  7. Robo_Typ07 = 71 Voices
  8. Robo_Typ08 = 68 Voices
  9. Robo_Typ09 = 69 Voices
  10. Robo_Typ10 = 66 Voices

 

Number of Audio Waves: 680 + 680

Number of Audio Cues: 680 + 680 

Sample rate / bit rate: 48kHz-24bit + 44.1kHz-24bit

Audio file types: Wav

Loopable: NO

Additional: Stereo 

Minutes of audio provided: 29:28

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
